articles.title: Pete Hammond’s Final Oscar Predictions In All 23 Categories - Deadline
articles.description: Deadline's Pete Hammond makes his predictions about who will win in every category at the 2025 Oscars.
articles.content:
And now for the final word on who will win the gold Sunday at the 97th Oscars.
Since Cannes in May I have been reviewing the movies, assessing their awards potential, predicting the Oscar nomination… [+16376 chars]
